table.name: route_code_profile
table.description: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE table defines the profile of route codes, which allows flexibility to group route codes in a profile and specify if they are compatible for rebate functionality.

columns.name: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_GID is the unique identifier for the route code profile.

columns.name: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_XID
columns.description: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_XID is the unique external identifier for the route code profile.

columns.name: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_NAME
columns.description: ROUTE_CODE_PROFILE_NAME is text for the name of the route code profile

columns.name: IS_COMPATIBLE
columns.description: A true or false indicator that identifies whether the route codes are compatible.
